function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of water droplets in the air","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through water droplets","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and using air purifiers","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building owners, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Role of social distance","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases through close contact","Mitigation":"Promoting social distancing measures and public health guidelines","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns, contact tracing apps","People":"General public","Owner":"Government health agencies, community leaders"},{"Description":"Development of social distance index P d","Impact":"Inadequate measurement of social distancing effectiveness","Mitigation":"Developing a comprehensive social distance index based on scientific evidence","Technologies":"Data analytics, epidemiological modeling","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
